post.body: - that's so DEPRESSING.
- Arggh. My fault. Reschedule after T-day? Also - you get to go the the parks everyday?!
- 8 cities in 7 years, average of 2 moves a year. (Right after college I moved a bunch) http://tinyurl.com/5s79cu
- I owe you an answer about wikistyle editing. Sorry it's taken a while.
is creating a directory of schools using Skype - join in here: http://skypeinschools.pbwiki.com/
- tools people suggested for making videos: imovie, picasa 3, photostory 3, photostory, scrapblog, voicethread (i used imovie)
- you rock!
- you are now obliged to answer a question!
- ask your questions to community here: http://cli.gs/jqGVY6
- Video how tos: http://cli.gs/P8RW5A
- Can you respond to this person, GREAT question on school policy. http://cli.gs/PLWgH6
- using classroom acct's or email addies? What's your filtering like at school? I'll get more info from support.
- what color nano should I get mom for Christmas? I want to help her with OUR marathon. hint hint. Get ready.
- Embed a video on PBwiki instructions here: http://tinyurl.com/6cq6qj
-- thanks!
- can i use you wiki (commercialsp) as a demo in our Newsletter?
- that's great. If you need help, just respond to the email. We're here to walk you through the transition if you would like :)
Sorry to vex you. We believe 2.0 is a better product & want you to offer the best wiki experience.
- A PBwiki password is just like your email password. Remember to log out when you use public computers.
- Format your thable so the width is in % of the page rather than a number of pixels
- http://pbwikimanual.pbwiki.com/Tables
- I did! Technology can be so frustrating, it's even worse when you think you have it under control.
- Boring? Say it's not so!
socialmediaclub.pbwiki.com -- Looking snazzy in PBwiki 2.0.
You would think that student loan repayment websites would be easy to use.... I wonder how many people get frustrated and just don't pay!
You can check out my presentation University wiki here: https://texastechpresentation.pbwiki.com/
Have a presentation with CIO of a University, suddenly nervous. Mostly because I can't figure out the time zone conversion. WHAT IS THIS!
FYI: Edu and Personal wikis are free no matter how many users. Biz wikis are paid. @kristinwolff @StevenWalling
Landed. Finally.
Sitting in the Pittsburgh airport at the Boston gate --- gloating. Go Steelers!
Thankful to be with my family today!
Cyberbully mom is found guilty - http://tinyurl.com/5lyga6 -
Looking for some advice -- What words do you use to describe your wiki?
I am officially sick. Plus it's raining. My flight leaves at 11PM. The dog is traveling with me. I predict trouble.
Have my first official kinda-creepy stalkerish person on my PBwiki instructional videos.
I have the "waiting at the apple store blues" Been here an hour already.
PBwiki is blocked in China, I don't think there is a way around that... Unless you have some serious Chinese hacker friends. @NergizK
Using the wiki to record and post my work flow. The next person to have my job will have a MUCH easier time. Highly recommend.
Here's how (and why) to use your wiki page RSS. http://tinyurl.com/5g4ukx
Working on Pbwiki Summer camp - for spring semester. Getting the syllabus out and to you today!
Was sent a link to a users PBwiki 1.0 & I actually flinched. YIKES! 2.0's much prettier. I beg you to migrate, for my the sake of my eyes.
Do you use your classroom wiki to communicate with the parents of your students? If so, DM me, I'd like to chat with you!
What online tools do you use to share grades?
Hey all! Mark and I are at CTAP, talking learning in the 21st century. On demand, student driven, and collaborative learning.
Here is the movie I ended up with. The outtakes from our Christmas card: http://vimeo.com/2459291
CTAP presentation tomorrow. Talking about (un)blocking online tools for use in the classroom. Say hi if you attend :)
Thanks guys!
What tool should I use to make a video out of my photos -- not animoto though.. ideas?
What's your wiki tip of the day?
Massachusetts - almost as good as Singapore. Way better than average US scores on Math&Science - http://tinyurl.com/6ybcju
I have a new obsession, la petite capucine - http://vimeo.com/896955 - what a great way to learn french (from a 4 year old).
Edublog awards - vote for your favorite education wiki! http://tinyurl.com/5t5sy3 --- I like the digitally speaking wiki myself ;)
Mom wanted feedback on her christmas meal. Sent an email. WHAT! Put that on a wiki! http://christmasfeast.pbwiki.com/
Woot! PBWiki Leads The Hosted Wiki Pack: Few tools are as effective as a wiki... http://tinyurl.com/3wm5s5
Restrict access to your files on PBwiki. I explain here: http://cli.gs/84gG0m
Screenflow is flowing with -5000 errors. Why? How can I fix this!?
Great plagiarism checker - paste student's paper & it tells you if it was plagiarized. http://cli.gs/YygdrX How are you doing this now?
Three favorite PBwikis of '08 -- twitter.pbwiki.com, commercialspace.pbwiki.com and crm20.pbwiki.com -- what are your favorites?
